data.title: Home
data.text:
Tivoli Associates has developed Tivoli Storage Manager Implementations, backup and recovery strategies, disaster recovery and Data center relocation, and storage implementation plans for hundreds of companies worldwide.

With more than 20 years of professional experience, our competitive priced products and consulting services are recognized as the best in the business when it comes to Storage Management, Backup, and Disaster Recovery processes.

Tivoli Associates, an independently owned and operated company with corporate offices in Austin, TX, was founded by Ross Battaglia in 1999 to continue development, support, and services of Tivoli Storage Manager after IBM purchased Tivoli Systems. Starting from TSM 7.1.2, IBM® has changed the name from IBM Tivoli Storage Manager to IBM Spectrum Protect which is one of the modules of IBM Spectrum Storage.

IBM has granted Tivoli Associates, Inc. a direct Tier One relationship to provide services, support, and development on IBM® Spectrum Protect™, formerly Tivoli® Storage Manager. IBM utilizes our extensive experience for their Subject Matter Experts on TSM to write and develop Tivoli Storage Certification exams, training documentation, code development and quality assurance testing before product launches and we are the leading expert resource for IBM on IBM® Spectrum Protect™, worldwide.

In 2003, due to growth and extended business requirements with IBM and the IBM Customers, Tivoli Associates began development of their own proprietary software,TSMManager, and expanded from IBM-only software to establishing partnerships with leading edge independent software corporations involved in the areas of storage and Big Data management, data movement, replication, transparency and analytics. Tivoli Associates continues to develop and enhance our Storage Management products.

Tivoli Associates’ core focus is in assisting organizations in the complete process of ensuring and protecting the integrity of their information systems and the confidentiality of their data by providing excellence in product, technical, and consultancy IT services.

Since Tivoli Associates, Inc. was launched, the company has experienced phenomenal growth. Today, this experienced team of software professionals manage a robust portfolio of clients worldwide.

Our company provides TSMManager software that significantly enhances customers' IBM® Spectrum Protect™ / TSM usage and experience.
